info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 3:41PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Litchfield, southwestern Berkshire, northeastern Dutchess and southeastern Columbia Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 340 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pine Plains, or 14 miles east of Rhinebeck, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Great Barrington, Copake, Sheffield, Pine Plains, Ancram, Canaan, Millerton, Sandisfield, Ashley Falls, Bethel, Salisbury, New Marlborough, Smithfield, Monterey, Tyringham, Sodom, Pachin Mills, Ancramdale, Hartsville and Konkapot. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
